attractions.name: Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park
attractions.description: A memorial park dedicated to the victims of the atomic bombing, featuring monuments and museums promoting peace.

attractions.name: Atomic Bomb Dome
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage site preserved as a reminder of the tragic events of 1945.

attractions.name: Itsukushima Shrine
attractions.description: Famous Shinto shrine on Miyajima Island with its iconic floating torii gate.

attractions.name: Hiroshima Castle
attractions.description: Reconstructed castle surrounded by a moat, featuring a museum on samurai culture.

attractions.name: Shukkeien Garden
attractions.description: A beautiful Japanese garden with ponds, bridges, and seasonal flowers.
